{"id":948010753,"question_id":202,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 1 month","timestamp":1683743972,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/948010753/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Happy Number","memory":"40.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean isHappy(int n) {\n        ArrayList<Integer> hs = new ArrayList<>();\n        int curSum = 0;\n        hs.add(n);\n        while(true){\n            if(n==1)\n                return true;\n            while(n>0){\n                curSum+=Math.pow(n%10,2);\n                n/=10;\n            }\n            n = curSum;\n            curSum = 0;\n            if(hs.contains(n))\n                return false;\n            else\n                hs.add(n);\n        }\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"happy-number","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
